main.article:
Get involved

jemris is distributed under GPLv3 license as a spare time project at the Department of Medical Imaging Physics.

We would like to encourage collegues to get involved in further developing it. We have some open projects such as general reconstruction code for non-Cartesian and PI reconstrcution. Also we are in need of investing some effort in the future development of the GUI towards python/Java.

We also need help with package maintenance for OpenSuSE, RedHat etc.

In any case contact us with a short description of your interest and coding background. With high hopes and best regards.
